testsuite.name: QRCodeApiTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #2
Response: GET /api/qrcode?size=150&type=png
Response body does not contain a correct image: Expected image hash b67a6f17fe353b997585e65e2903ab7b, but was a370a8d3e1ee0f0184132a3c3b5d2952 Make sure the size, the contents and the format of the image are correct.
